p: We had audition today far Fair Shows and are definitely accepted. Travel all over Minn. for four wks. Do only Russian number Rehearsals this wk. - we leave this Sunday. Max, Sig, pan, Elaine, Mr. and Mrs. Mueller arrived today just as George came to tell us of audition! Strange yet true - everything comes at once. Do hope Sig and Armin have good luck with them.
(We work as soloists with background of line girls.
Will send babies soon as can. Loads of Love - my dear ones
Grand to see everyone. So glad about K., Daddy
stamp: U.S. POSTAL CARD ONE CENT 1 JEFFERSON 1
